page.title: 05HOME LIFE-A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: When we get to school I watch boys playing,then I throw a ball until the whistle goes.Our school is on two sites,one on each side of the road.At 12.10 p.m it is dinner.The canteen is on the other side of the road.Usually I stay for sandwiches but today I am going home.We are having a cooked meal tonight so dinner is only sandwiches. School begins again at 1.30 p.m but we go earlier.Afternoon lessons finish at 3.40.I walk home with some friends. Dad comes home at 5.15 and we all have a drink.At about 5.45 we have tea.It is chips and beans.After tea my mum takes my brother to cubs.At 7.30 my brother comes home.We both have a cup of coffee around 9.30 then we go to bed.I read a book until 10.15 then go to sleep.
